name: Trump International Hotels Management D/B/A Trump Hotel Collection
description: Trump International Hotels Management, also known as the Trump Hotel Collection, is a management company for the hotels owned by President Trump. The company has hotels across the United States and around the world bearing the Trump name, including in Las Vegas, Washington, D.C. and Vancouver.

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president/member of Trump International Hotels Management LLC, which Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned 17125815 in management fees & other contract payments income from TRUMP INTERNATIONAL HOTELS MANAGEMENT LLC, valued at Over $50,000,000. Underlying Assets: management company. Location: New York, NY. See attached schedule.
